snippet: After a standoff, heavily armed Russians allowed several members of an unarmed Ukrainian Air Force unit in Belbek to return to their usual posts.
abstract: Seven-hour standoff between Ukrainian and Russian forces near airfield in Belbek, Ukraine, after which 12 Ukrainian soldiers are allowed through barricades to their posts, represents both odd compromise and the closest that opposing forces have come to open conflict; strangeness and unease of scene reflects curious nature of conflict.
lead_paragraph: After a standoff, heavily armed Russians allowed several members of an unarmed Ukrainian Air Force unit in Belbek to return to their usual posts.

headline.main: No Bloodshed in a Standoff at an Airfield in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: No Bloodshed in a Standoff at an Airfield in Ukraine
